attributes.action: Petition Home Office re decisions to deny entry clearance for Mrs E.Tait Wife and Mother, Tait Family, Aldeburgh
attributes.additional_details:
PETITION TO THE HOME OFFICE FOR AN IMMEDIATE REVIEW OF THE DECISION(S) BY THE BRITISH EMBASSY IN MOSCOW TO DENY (TWICE) A VISITOR’S VISA TO EUGENIA TAIT, MOTHER AND WIFE OF UK CITIZENS AND RESIDENTS ANGELA JANE TAIT, AGED 5, AND CHARLES JAMES TAIT, SCHOOLTEACHER.
These decisions are a breach of basic human rights and constitute an unwarranted rupture of a happy Aldeburgh family by a government body. We, the undersigned protest that these decisions strike at the core principles of family integrity and of unity in the community. We put our names to this petition to demand an immediate review of these decisions.
